pages.text: A four-sided die made of emerald. The fact that it doesn't break is surprising.$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Deals up to 4 extra damage, and has a 5% chance to drop a $(l:extrastuck:misc/luck_token)luck token$(/l) on hit.
Combine a $(l:extrastuck:weapons/gold_coin)gold coin$(/l) and a dice in the totem lathe.
